title: EnvisaMon Event
description: Payload for the EnvisaMon REST API

event_id.description: A unique UUID v4 identifier for the event.

event_unixtime.description: The Unix timestamp when the event occurred, represented as a string.

event_message.description: The cleaned log message or event description.

message_type.description: The type or category of the message (e.g., TPI, LOG).

system_id.description: Identifier for the alarm system or monitoring instance.
